title: 7 Sports Recovery Treatments In Hong Kong
author: Doris Lam
description: From ice chambers, infrared saunas, to IV treatments, we found the best post-workout recovery treatments in Hong Kong.
cleaned_text: Say goodbye to sore muscles—these sports recovery treatments will help you feel better in no time If you've been hitting the [gym](https://hk.asiatatler.com/life/sweat-in-style-7-boutique-gyms-to-try-in-hong-kong) harder than usual to make up for the month when [gyms were closed](https://hk.asiatatler.com/life/hong-kong-social-distancing-covid-19), book yourself a sports recovery treatment to give your muscles a break. Sports recovery not only helps sore muscles recover and regenerate faster, but it'll also improve your performance in the long run. From IV therapy, sensory deprivation tanks to laser therapy, we list out the best sports recovery treatments in Hong Kong for you to visit on your next rest day. See also: [Why Exercise Is More Important Than Ever and How to Stay Safe Doing It](https://hk.asiatatler.com/life/safe-exercise-hong-kong-gyms) 1. IV Therapy at The Upper House IV drips aren't only reserved for the hospital anymore. Health junkies around the world have been obsessed with this wellness trend the last few years, welcoming the slight discomfort of a needle for the sake of optimal health. With promises to boost your [immune system](https://hk.asiatatler.com/life/alternative-immunity-boosting-methods-in-hong-kong), improve [skin appearance](https://hk.asiatatler.com/style/best-hydrating-overnight-masks), combat [jet-lag](https://hk.asiatatler.com/life/beat-jet-lag-by-hanging-upside-down) and even rehydrate your body to promote faster muscle recovery, IV therapy will become your new best friend—as long as you brave the needle. The hardest part of this therapy treatment? The beginning. Much like a normal IV drip, a nurse or a healthcare professional will first insert a needle into a vein to connect the small IV tube into your bloodstream. After that, all you'll have to do is sit back and relax and let the cocktail of vitamins seep into your system. To choose the right IV therapy treatment for you, consult with the medical professional at the centre to learn about the different vitamins they have on offer. Each treatment session lasts about 30 to 60 minutes, depending on how fast your body absorbs the vitamins. If you're looking for a luxe treatment, try out [The Upper House](https://www.upperhouse.com/en/default)'s Wellness IV therapy treatment as part of their in-room wellness offers, or head over to [RevivMe](https://revivme.com/clinics/hong-kong/) or [LifeHub](https://thelifehub.com/services-ivdrip/) in Central for a midday pick-me-up.
